title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Co-Creation-Based Learner Engagement Design in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more medical education scenarios using collaborative co-creation techniques.
Learners can collaboratively produce mobile-optimized microlearning content with peers.
Learners can propose educational design improvements by applying a feedback framework based on Self-Determination Theory.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
